txt.en:
'I am here to help you learn about what will make you a more powerful Rune-keeper. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you to unleash upon your foes.

'Use your skill <rgb=#00ff00>Fiery Ridicule</rgb> against a Training Dummy.'

HINT: Rune-keepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells. <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills. Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>green</rgb> backgrounds.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Rune-keeper someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'

'Use your skill to strike the Training Dummy.'\n\nHINT: Rune-keepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells. <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills. Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>green</rgb> backgrounds.
As you become more powerful, new skills will become available to help you develop into a more formidable Rune-keeper.
You have struck the Training Dummy with the skill 'Fiery Ridicule'
Use your skill 'Fiery Ridicule' on the Training Dummy nearby

Use your skill <rgb=#FF0000>Fiery Ridicule</rgb> on the Training Dummy nearby. \n\nHINT: Rune-keepers require <rgb=#ff0000>Battle Attunement</rgb> to use offensive skills, and <rgb=#00ff00>Healing Attunement</rgb> to cast healing spells. <rgb=#ffff00>Attunement</rgb> is <rgb=#ff0000>raised</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>lowered</rgb> through the use of similar skills. Offensive Skills typically have <rgb=#ff0000>red</rgb> backgrounds, and Healing skills typically have <rgb=#00ff00>green</rgb> backgrounds.
Talk to the Rune-keeper Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
The Rune-keeper Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your skill, you should return to your trainer and tell her of your success.
